en.title: Winter Solstice Sound Bath
en.description: A transformative sound healing experience to mark the longest night.
en.detail:
# Winter Solstice Sound Bath

Join us for a transformative sound healing experience to mark the longest night of the year.

## What to Expect

Immerse yourself in the healing vibrations of crystal singing bowls, gongs, and sacred instruments as we honor the turning of the wheel.

## Benefits

- Deep relaxation and stress release
- Energetic clearing and balancing
- Connection with the solstice energies
- Community and shared intention

## What to Bring

- Yoga mat or blanket
- Comfortable clothing
- Water bottle
- Open heart and mind

en.title: Venus & Creativity Session
en.description: Explore how Venus transits enhance creativity and self-expression.
en.detail:
# Venus & Creativity Session

Explore how Venus transits enhance creativity and self-expression in this interactive online workshop.

## Workshop Overview

Venus governs our sense of beauty, pleasure, and creative expression. Learn to harness Venus transits to unlock your artistic potential.

## Topics Covered

- Understanding Venus in your birth chart
- Current Venus transits and their influence
- Creative exercises aligned with Venus energy
- Building a Venus-inspired creative practice

## Requirements

- Stable internet connection
- Zoom installed
- Journal and creative supplies (optional)

en.title: Full Moon Reflection Circle
en.description: A guided reflection practice under the light of the full moon.
en.detail:
# Full Moon Reflection Circle

Gather under the full moon for a guided reflection practice that honors lunar wisdom.

## Circle Format

We'll create sacred space together, share intentions, and engage in guided meditation under the moonlight.

## What We'll Do

- Opening ceremony and grounding
- Full moon meditation
- Journaling prompts
- Sharing circle (optional)
- Closing ritual

## Bring With You

- Journal and pen
- Warm layers
- Something to sit on
- An open heart

en.title: New Year Intention Setting
en.description: Set powerful intentions aligned with the cosmic new year.
en.detail:
# New Year Intention Setting

The astrological new year begins at the Spring Equinox. Join us to set powerful intentions aligned with this cosmic fresh start.

## Why the Equinox?

When the Sun enters Aries at the equinox, we experience a burst of initiating energy. This is the true cosmic new year - a potent time for new beginnings.

## Workshop Flow

1. Releasing the old year
2. Equinox meditation
3. Vision crafting
4. Intention setting ritual
5. Creating accountability structures

## This Event is Free

As a gift to our community, this workshop is offered freely. Donations welcome but not required.

en.title: Autumn Equinox Gathering
en.description: Celebrated the balance of light and dark with community.
en.detail:
# Autumn Equinox Gathering

We gathered to celebrate the balance of light and dark, honoring the harvest season.

## Event Highlights

This past event brought together 25 seekers to mark the turning of the seasons.

## What We Did

- Gratitude ceremony
- Equinox meditation
- Community sharing
- Seasonal treats and connection

## Thank You

To all who joined us - your presence made this gathering magical.

en.title: Mercury Retrograde Workshop
en.description: Learned to navigate and thrive during retrograde seasons.
en.detail:
# Mercury Retrograde Workshop

We learned to navigate and thrive during Mercury retrograde seasons in this empowering workshop.

## Topics We Covered

- Mercury retrograde myths vs reality
- Practical strategies for communication
- Tech backup best practices
- Using retrograde for reflection

## Recording Available

If you missed this workshop, a recording is available for purchase.
